Use a reputed media player that can play H.265 (HEVC : High Efficiency Video Coding) videos has proper ASS subtitle support. 
MPC-HC, MPC-BE, MPV... are recommended :]  
http://mpc-hc.org  
http://mpcbe.sourceforge.net 
VLC and players like latest GOM, KMP with LAV can play HEVC, but MPC-HC, MPC-BE, MPV... with madVR gives better quality :) 
Linux, Mac, Chrome : MPV.io | libde265.org 
In Mobile, Android, Tabs, use a media player like MX Player, VLC Player... that can play H.265. 
 
H.265 is the Next Generation Codec... Some software media players that are not up-to date may not play HEVC video! 
Most hardware players, TVs are unable to play HEVC.... But some newest TVs support HEVC (+ 4K video) and will become mainstream in near future!.. :] 
Wait for the future.. :) 
HEVC (H.265) Video : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Efficiency_Video_Coding 
ASS/SSA Sub Format : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SubStation_Alpha
